messages.message: Invalid sample channelType for colorModel in the basic DFD block.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #4 channelType in basic DFD block is (0xA) which is not valid for colorModel KHR_DF_MODEL_RGBSDA.

messages.message: Invalid sample in basic DFD block. The samples must match the expected samples of the VkFormat.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #4 channelType in basic DFD block is (0xA) but the expected value is KHR_DF_CHANNEL_RGBSDA_ALPHA for VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM.
